name: Toxic pollutants
functionStatement: Physical and chemical processes limit pollutants, retain beneficial constituents, and protect ecological and human uses.
descriptionMarkdown: No visible sheen or strong odor, consistent with an unpolluted stream.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Note visible sheen or odor and check available contamination or discharge records. Collect samples only when warranted.

levels.label: Optimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: No known exceedances and no visible indicators.

levels.label: Suboptimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Occasional minor issues or mild odor.

levels.label: Marginal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Recognized contamination risk with moderate stress indicators.

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Chronic or severe toxin indicators, fish kills, or persistent sheen.

references: EPA TRI and EPA ECHO as supporting context.
